page.title: 07EVENTS IN OLDBURY
page.content: There are many events in Oldbury on Severn. There is a village Fair with a Gymkhana, side stalls and even a boat tub race held on the Pill (a natural stream.) The children from the school take part in Maypole dancing. We have a Fun Run, Horticultural Show (adults and children can enter.) There is a Pancake Race for the children of the village. The village enters the Best Kept Village competion and has finished runner-up in the small villages' competition. There is a lot of Fox Hunting in this area by the Berkeley Hunt. The huntsmen are dressed in their yellow and green riding jackets and sometimes we see them riding past the school.
